name: Grown-Up Titans ( Teen Titans)
description:
Our story starts long ago before the creation of a legendary sidekick team Teen Titans! First you will be playing as a Man who want kill Demon King Trigon, and your goal will be to seduce innocent Arella (future mother of Raven) and other Azarath Girls!  

Patreon Link for Support!
